RESOLVED_ENTITIES.vehicles: RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented aliens: individuals being transported in vehicles stopped by United States Border Patrol agents, often dropped off near Farm-to-Market Road 2050 to avoid checkpoints and walk to Highway 16 for further transportation to cities like Houston or San Antonio, sitting stiff and not communicating with each other during transport, admitted to being in the country illegally
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle and IGN: Vehicles involved in the incident, including a white Malibu sedan and a black Dodge pickup truck, stopped near the Border Patrol Station Parking Lot, suspected of transporting illegal aliens, both lacked wind farm stickers and were traveling in tandem on Farm-to-Market Road 2050
